## Odessa Website Project

This is a modern, responsive website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

### Project Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Follow mobile-first responsive design principles
- Maintain consistent color scheme using CSS variables
- Keep JavaScript modular and well-commented
- Optimize for performance and accessibility

### File Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file
- `css/styles.css` - All styles and responsive layouts
- `js/script.js` - Interactive functionality
- `images/` - Image assets directory

### Development Notes
- CSS uses Flexbox and Grid for layouts
- Smooth scrolling enabled for navigation
- Form validation included in contact section
- Responsive breakpoint at 768px for mobile devices
